duration.Description: Duration of trial from presentation of the letter to end of fixation period

Levels.no_response: trial does not require a response
Levels.1-back: references previous trial location/letter for response
Levels.2-back: references trial twice prior location/letter for response

accuracy.Description: Indicates if participant made correct or incorrect response

response_time.Description: Subject response time measrured from beginning of presentation of second stimulus
